metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2602 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high.
metadata.Description:
io_uring UAF, Unix SCM garbage collection David Bouman and Billy Jheng Bing Jhong discovered that a race condition existed in the io_uring subsystem in the Linux kernel, leading to a use- after-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic-64k - 5.19.0-23.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1010-azure - 5.19.0-1010.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-6.2.0-36-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-36-generic-64k - 5.19.0-23.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1010-azure - 5.19.0-1010.11
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: David Bouman and Billy Jheng Bing Jhong working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-23.24').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-azure package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-1010.11').
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was pending').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.

linux-oracle package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-23.24').
